page.title: 16Clubs and organisations
page.content:
Out of school hours children can either pursue their own activities or can join with others in various clubs or organisations.Wesley Methodist have cubs,scouts,brownies, guides,venture scouts and a youth club.St.Andrews have cubs,brownies, guides and a youth club.There are several football clubs,two riding schools and two dancing schools.For adults there are various clubs in this area such as billiards,video,keep fit and a Parents' Association. Older people in the area have an Autumn Club and an Over Sixties Club.
{
